Welcome to xnatio’s documentation!¶

class xnatio.Data(data, options=None)[source]¶
add_column(name, exp, subs)[source]¶

Adds a new calculated column

exp: str
the expression to caluate the column
subs: dict
substitutions to be made in the expression ex: {“x”:”experiment/dian:cdrsuppdata/data_feilds/date”}

columns: dict

get_data(options=None)[source]¶

Aggregates and returns data

Flattens out the heirarchal data by combining like data into points using their least common ancestor

options: dict

Options for the aggregation

“format”: “list” | “points”
the format of the data to be returned list returns a dict of labelled lists of data points returns a list of labelled dict data points default: “points”
list or dict
(see options > “format”)
get_ui()[source]¶

Returns a gui to allow the user to select data fields

ipywidget
an ipywidget to be displayed
static path2str(path)[source]¶

Makes a string from a path

path: list
the path to be converted
str
the string representing the path
select_path(path)[source]¶

Selects a path

path: list
the new path to be added
dict
the dict containing all selected paths
set_option(key, value)[source]¶

Sets an option

key: string
the key (or name) of the object to be set
value: Any
the value to be attributed to the key

None

set_options(options)[source]¶

Sets multiple options

A function to set multiple options

options: dict
a dict of options in form “key”:”value” to be set
